description: This continuation of 261 emphasizes sight playing, score reading, harmonization and transposition, more advanced improvisation and harmonic usage. Students earning a grade of B- or higher meet the department's Level IV keyboard proficiency standards. Prerequisite: Music 261, equivalency examination III, or audition placement. Offered Spring Semester.
name: Piano Class IV
prerequisites: Music 261, equivalency examination III, or audition placement. Offered Spring Semester.
